user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mr. Harrison Blackwood (hblackwood@investor.com) detailing our collaboration potential. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Collaboration Details & Notion Access

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. To prepare an informed response regarding a potential partnership with Sterling & Locke, could you kindly share the latest materials outlining our possible areas of collaboration?  

If the information is already organized in your Notion workspace, a link or brief directions on where to look would be perfect. I’ll review everything right away so we can move the conversation forward promptly.

Many thanks for your help, and please let me know if there’s anything you need from my side.

Best regards,

Harrison Blackwood  
hblackwood@investor.com

final_output:
